definition: Alan, Allen, Allan, Alain etc (name)/A-lan (Chinese female name)
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: It's four stops from here to Alander Supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 离阿兰德超市还有四站路。
阿兰汉森就是这样的人。

sentences.english: My friend Alan has asked me to be the best man at his wedding.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友阿兰邀请我在他的婚礼上担任伴郎。

sentences.english: Casey Dunn will receive the Alan T. Waterman Award.
sentences.chinese: 凯西邓恩将收到阿兰吨沃特曼奖。

sentences.english: Are you related to Alanis, the singer?
sentences.chinese: 你与阿兰妮斯，那个歌星有亲属关系吗？

sentences.english: Three tortoises, Mick, Alan and Les, decide to go on a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 三只乌龟，米克，阿兰和莱斯决定去野餐。

sentences.english: And Hazael king of Syria died, and Benadad his son reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 阿兰王哈匝耳死后，他的儿子本哈达得继位为王。

sentences.english: Alana is getting fatter and fatter. Why doesn't she try to lose some weight?
sentences.chinese: 阿兰娜越来越胖了，她为什么不试着减肥呢？
阿兰的汗从脸上流了下来。

sentences.english: You know at least three people named Alan Wong.
sentences.chinese: 你认识至少三个叫“阿兰王”的人。

sentences.english: Alanna strips naked and tries to get started before Dirty D can even introduce her.
sentences.chinese: 阿兰娜条裸体并试图开始之前脏D甚至可以介绍她。

sentences.english: Theytramped round but as Alan already knew, there was no way in.
sentences.chinese: 他们绕过去，但正如阿兰早就知道的那样，无路可进。

sentences.english: They tramped round but as Alan already knew, there was no way in.
sentences.chinese: 绕，但正如阿兰早就知道的那样，无路可进。

sentences.english: Lan did not marry, this makes us very open-eyed .
sentences.chinese: 阿兰没结婚，这令我们颇为惊讶。
